ygData.subject: RE: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Right, but it is possible to stand right next to a mob while invis and have it not attack you for many pulses.  I have done this in several places. Kit ...
ygData.messageBody:
Right, but it is possible to stand right next to a mob while invis and have
it not attack you for many pulses. I have done this in several places.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 2:39 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual Bard Invisibility Question


On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> That would seem to indicate you could not stand in front of any aggressive
> mob while playing invis. When the song visibly pulsed he would attack
you.
> Since this does not happen, I have one theory why not which explains
another

The mob didn't attack us because it was busy fighting the
people who started the train.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
